debutant.nom: bounce ball twice on the table, stop, bounce two more times, stop, then prime to play
debutant.description: Concise description of beginner routine with explicit cues.

intermediaire.nom: stretch out, holding ball just over middle line and come to a stop, focusing on serve
intermediaire.description: Concise description of intermediate routine with explicit cues.

exercices_complementaires.nom: give right sleeve a tug with left arm, then step to the table and drop playing arm and pull it back and then forward like pendulum
exercices_complementaires.description: Concise description of serving routine with explicit cues.
